subject: Football
College Athletics
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: While college football’s power brokers are adamant that there is no chance of an N.F.L.-style playoff in the near future, there are also hints at a change in the system.
snippet: While college football’s power brokers are adamant that there is no chance of an N.F.L.-style playoff in the near future, there are also hints at a change in the system.
